titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the recognition, protection, promotion, and facilitation of the annual JFK 50 Mile.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary: 1/5/2011--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that: (1) the Cumberland Valley Athletic Club and the Director of the National Park Service (NPS) should continue to accommodate members of the Armed Forces as they meet the challenge of the JFK 50 Mile marathon race; (2) the Club should work with the NPS to accommodate growth of the JFK 50 Mile as such event approaches its 50th year in 2012; (3) any growth over 2,000 participants should be at the mutual consent of the Director and the Club; and (4) the U.S. government should recognize the desire to protect and promote the heritage and historical significance of the JFK 50 Mile.
